name: sheaf
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a number of things, especially pieces of paper or plant stems, that are held or tied together: A lawyer walked in carrying a whole sheaf of papers. The corn was cut and tied in sheaves. Synonym
bundle

Add to word list
Add to word list
a number of things held or tied together: A sheaf of papers lay on her desk. Sheaves of dry corn stalks leaned against the fence.
